primary.description: Fresh Sage Green - Used for main actions, active states, and branding.

secondary.description: Oatmeal/Stone - Used for secondary buttons, backgrounds, and subtle highlights.

accent.description: Terracotta - Used for alerts, 'low stock' warnings, and call-to-actions that need pop.

background.description: Pure White for cards, Warm White (Stone-50) for page background.

foreground.description: Deep Forest Green for text, softer green-gray for secondary text.

layout_strategies.dashboard_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 p-6 md:p-8

bento_cells.hero: col-span-full md:col-span-8 row-span-2 bg-stone-50 rounded-3xl p-8 relative overflow-hidden
bento_cells.stats: col-span-6 md:col-span-4 row-span-1 bg-white rounded-3xl p-6 border border-stone-100
bento_cells.list: col-span-full md:col-span-4 row-span-2 bg-white rounded-3xl p-6 border border-stone-100

buttons.primary: bg-[#4A7C59] text-white hover:bg-[#3A6346] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-[#E8E4D9] text-[#2C3E2C] hover:bg-[#D8D4C9] rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-[#4A7C59] hover:bg-[#4A7C59]/10 rounded-full px-4 py-2 transition-all

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-stone-100 shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] overflow-hidden transition-all hover:border-[#4A7C59]/30

inputs.base: bg-white border border-stone-200 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-[#1A2E1A] placeholder:text-stone-400 focus:border-[#4A7C59] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#4A7C59]/20 transition-all outline-none

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background or main dashboard visual

pantry_header.usage: Pantry page header or empty state background

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME OVERHAUL: Completely remove the 'Wicked' dark theme. Switch to the 'Fresh Greens' light theme defined in colors.
2. PANTRY FEATURE: Build the new Pantry/Inventory page using the 'Bento Grid' layout. Use the 'pantry_header' image as a subtle top banner.
3. TYPOGRAPHY: Replace 'Cinzel' with 'Playfair Display' for all H1-H3 headings. Use 'Manrope' for all body text.
4. COMPONENTS: Update all Shadcn components to match the 'component_rules'. Remove sharp edges and neon glows. Use rounded corners and soft shadows.
5. DASHBOARD: Implement the dashboard using the 'dashboard_grid' layout. It should show: Upcoming Meals, Pantry Status (Low Stock Alerts), and Quick Shopping List.
6. ALERTS: Use the 'accent' color (Terracotta) for items that are low in stock or expiring soon.
7. NAVIGATION: Ensure the navigation bar is clean, white, and uses the 'primary' color for the active state.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) for testing.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
